price: Ọ̀ṣọ́ ìṣẹ̀mí ayé ni dúkìá àti àwọn ọmọ. Àwọn iṣẹ́ rere tó máa wà títí láéláé lóore jùlọ ní ẹ̀san lọ́dọ̀ Olúwa rẹ, ó sì lóore jùlọ ní ìrètí.
arabic: ٱلۡمَالُ وَٱلۡبَنُونَ زِينَةُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ أَمَلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: al-mālu wal-banūna zīnatu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wal-bāqiyātu al-ṣāliḥātu khayrun ʿinda rabbika thawāban wakhayrun amalan
